title: configuration solr with uima is done but when we  ingest some doc in solr we can able see the fields which is coming from entity extraction of uima..i can not understand what i do right now

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content:
This sounds like a support request, not a bug or a feature enhancement request.  If that's what this is, please join the solr-user mailing list and send your request there.

When you do, you'll need to include a lot more information about what you're seeing, what you've tried, and how Solr is configured.

http://lucene.apache.org/solr/discussion.html
